sourcesContent:
<template>
  <Card class="border">
    <template #title> Weekly Calorie Intake </template>
    <template #content>
      <Chart type="bar" :data="basicData" />
    </template>
  </Card>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  mounted() {
    this.basicData.labels = this.Last7Days();
  },
  methods: {
    Last7Days() {
        var result = [];
        for (var i = 0; i < 7; i++) {
            var d = new Date();
            d.setDate(d.getDate() - i);
            result.push(d.toLocaleDateString('en-us', { weekday: "long" }).slice(0, 3));
        }
        return result;
    },
  },
  data() {
    return {
      basicData: {
        labels: ['Mon', 'Tue', 'Wed', 'Thu', 'Fri', 'Sat', 'Sun'],
        datasets: [
          {
            backgroundColor: "#277BC0",
            data: [2100, 2300, 2000, 1900, 2400, 1800, 2500],
          },
        ],
      },
    };
  },
};
</script>

<style>
.border {
  border-top: 8px solid var(--blue);
  height: 250px;
  margin: 10px;
  height: min-content;
}
</style>
